page.description: Defines the indicator shown for a record in the List that has been deleted.

discussion.p: The *[ui:CSS - Deleted record row indicator]* property is the CSS applied to a row in the List that has been deleted. Out of the box ,the indicator shown is a black triangle in the upper right-hand corner of the List row for the deleted record.
Leave blank to use the default CSS.
